text: Johannes Marten "Joop" den Uyl Officialy den Uijl. (born August 9, 1919 in Hilversum - December 24, 1987 in Amsterdam) was a Dutch politician of the Labour Party (PvdA). Den Uyl was Prime Minister of the Netherlands from 1973 to 1977, the so-called Den Uyl cabinet. He was als a member of the Second Chamber, an alderman of Amsterdam, and a government minister. He studied economics at the University of Amsterdam. Although raised a Reformed Christian, he turned agnostic. Den Uyl died of a brain tumor, aged 68. == References == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1919 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Agnostics Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of the Netherlands Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch former Christians Category:Leaders of political parties in the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:People from Hilversum Category:Politicians from North Holland Category:Prime ministers of the Netherlands
title: Joop den Uyl
